item.title: About Me
item.description: Who am I? I have over 20 years experience developing unique software solutions over a wide variety of domains, from medical device manufacturing and medical imaging, to mining, finance, IoT, and autonomous vehicle control. I have worked with most major platforms and a large array of technologies, from simple websites, to enterprise scale mobile applications and advanced desktop visualization software. What do I do? In my current role as a Principal Consultant with Telstra Purple, I get to focus on uplifting both our internal and customer teams.
